nav.div: District » News » Enrollment During School Closure

li.span: Parent/Guardians who are looking to enroll students during this time will need to contact James McCall, Director of Student Services at (843) 544-3084.
Mr. McCall will schedule a date and time that parents may meet with individual school officials to complete the process.
Mr. McCall and the school will coordinate getting students the resources that they may need for distance learning.

span.span: If you are living in any of the following situations, your school-age children may qualify for certain rights and protections under the federal McKinney-Vento Act: Please contact Marlon Prince-McKinney-Vento, liaison at (843) 439-1485 or

li.span: In a shelter, a motel or campground due to the lack of an alternative adequate accommodation
In a car, park, abandoned building, or bus or train station
Doubled up with other people due to loss of housing or economic hardship

span.em: McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act, Title VII, Subtitle B (42 U.S.C. 11431 et seq.), as amended by the Every Student Succeeds Act (ESSA)

ul.li: 122 Broad Street Post Office Box 947, Bennettsville, SC 29512
